ProductInfo.Features:
Free Monitor: 1 x GWLED19IN 19" Wide Screen LED monitor in block with DVI and VGA inputs, 1360 x 768 Resolution, H:170˚  V:160˚ Maximum viewing angle
Free Accessories: 1 x GW100CAW: 100 feet pre-made cable BNC; 2 x GW60CAW: 60 feet pre-made cable BNC; 1 x GW25CAW: 25 feet pre-made cable BNC; 1 x GW12V2A: 12V2A Power Supply for Security Cameras; 1 x GW124CA: 1 to 4 Power Splitter Adapter Cables
Security Camera: 2 x GW808H: 1/3" Color SONY CMOS Outdoor Camera, 1000 TV lines, 2.8~12mm Manual Varifocal Lens, 42PCS Infrared LED, 114 feet IR Distance. 0.01 Lux/F1.2 Minimum Illumination. Metal vandal proof & water proof
Security Camera: 2 x GW807H: 1/3" Color SONY CMOS Indoor Camera, 1000 TV lines, 2.8~12mm Manual Varifocal Lens, 30PCS Infrared LED, 65 feet IR Distance. 0.01 Lux/F1.2 Minimum Illumination
DVR with 500GB HD: 1 x GW7204C with 500GB Hard Drive, 4 Channel H.264 960H & D1 Realtime DVR with HDMI & VGA. 960×480 & 30FPS recording. 4CH WD1 Recroding + 4 CH WD1 Playback. iPhone, Android Viewing. New color graphical menu. Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control
ProductInfo.Name: GW High End 4 Channel H.264 960H & D1 Realtime DVR with 4 x 1/3" SONY CMOS Camera, 1000 TV lines 2.8~12mm Manual Varifocal Lens IR CCTV Surveillance Security Camera System, Free LED Monitor, iPhone Android Compatible
